comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Frances Bell Heenan (1910-1956), aka "Peaches Browning," married to real estate mogul Edward Browning in 1926, when she was 16 and he was 51. Later that year, she sought a divorce from him. She married three more times, enjoyed some success in vaudeville, and died at 46, after a fall. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peaches_Browning Her grave: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=138 A book about the Browning scandal: www.amazon.com/Call-Me-Daddy-Benjamin-Feldman/dp/0615274110

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca for the details about "Peaches Browning". We will add some of it to our description when we update.
